title: Park
description: an enclosed park with a children's playground, and picnic area.

title: Library/Museum
description: a library and museum with local history exhibits.

title: Main Street
description: Simply main street. a lot of cool old buildings and shops.

title: Glassworks Studio
description: Working glassblowing studio with demos and workshops.

title: Civic Theater
description: Historic theater featuring live performances and films.

title: Skyline Café
description: Rooftop café with panoramic city views.
